skill.name: commander.skills.LeadDelay
skill.description: For the company commander, to perform a mission by issuing sub-tasks to subordinates. This skill may be used for defensive missions such as "Screen" or "Delay".

parameter.name: companyTask
parameter.description: The string name of the comany task to perform.

parameter.name: mainTasks
parameter.description: The string name of the main task to perform by the forward echelon of the company (the main platoon of the company will perform this mission).

parameter.name: supportTasks
parameter.description: The string name of the tasks issued to rear echelon units.

parameter.name: pcTasks
parameter.description: The string name of the task issued to the command post.

parameter.name: pcObjective
parameter.description: The main objective issued to the command post (a meeting position for instance).

parameter.name: peiTasks
parameter.description: The string name of the tasks issued to the scouting platoons.

parameter.name: mainTasksInit
parameter.description: The string name of the tasks issued to reach the objective before the deployment of the company.

parameter.name: engineerTask
parameter.description: The string name of the engineer tasks ("build" obstacles for instance).

parameter.name: defaultTask
parameter.description: The string name of the default task to issue ("follow" for instance).

parameter.name: taskForSupporting
parameter.description: The string name of the task issued to the rear echelon units to support the forward echelon units in case of attack.

link.name: AssignSETask
link.description: S'occupe de redistribuer les missions au SE.
